conversation.kanji: はい、クッキーがあるよ。食べる？
conversation.romaji: Hai, kukkii ga aru yo. Taberu?
conversation.english: Yes, there are cookies. Do you want some?

conversation.kanji: じゃあ、お茶も一緒に飲もうね。
conversation.romaji: Jaa, ocha mo issho ni nomou ne.
conversation.english: Then, let's drink tea together, okay?

examples: おやつの時間だよ！ (Oyatsu no jikan da yo!) - It's snack time!
おやつを食べてもいい？ (Oyatsu o tabete mo ii?) - Can I eat a snack?
私は犬が大好き！ (Watashi wa inu ga daisuki!) - I love dogs!
この映画が大好きです。 (Kono eiga ga daisuki desu.) - I love this movie.
一緒に遊ぼう！ (Issho ni asobou!) - Let's play together!
友達と一緒に映画を見た。 (Tomodachi to issho ni eiga o mita.) - I watched a movie with my friends.
私も行く！ (Watashi mo iku!) - I will go too!
お茶も飲みたい。 (Ocha mo nomitai.) - I also want to drink tea.

grammar.grammar: 〜ましょう/〜よう (mashou/you) - let's (do something together)
examples: 一緒に遊びましょう！ (Issho ni asobimashou!) - Let's play together!

grammar.grammar: 〜ね (ne) - seeking agreement or softening the tone
examples: 美味しいね！ (Oishii ne!) - It's delicious, isn't it?
楽しいね！ (Tanoshii ne!) - This is fun, right?
